::: incremental

2. You cannot make all your existing materials accessible overnight. 
3. We do not have all the answers to your specific needs, but we are happy to discuss and point you in the right direction.
:::

## Maths is Special
### 1. Equations
Good solution is [MathJax](https://www.mathjax.org/about) rendering of equations to HTML

::: fragment
``` tex
\begin{equation}
\int_0^\infty e^{-x^2}\,\text{d}x=\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}
\end{equation}
```
:::

::: fragment
```{=tex}
\begin{equation}
\int_0^\infty e^{-x^2}\,\text{d}x=\frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2}
\end{equation}
```
:::

## Some Tools
- Chirun - conversion to multiple formats, support available
- Pandoc - conversion of existing materials
- R Markdown, R Markdown, Quarto - frameworks for creating rich interactive notes and presentations; ideal for statistics and data analysis materials
- MS Office - shallow learning curve and ideal for relatively simple materials
- Jupyter Notebooks/Books - great for notes on numerical computation or computing
